title: ArquiReforma
description: Modern landing page for an architecture and renovation company, built with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Vite. You can view the deployed site at arquireforma.netlify.app. ArquiReforma is a single-page application (SPA) showcasing services focused on full renovations, interior design, and architectural solutions, featuring smooth scroll animations, a responsive layout, and a modern user interface.

title: LittleLemonAPI
description: RESTful API developed with Django REST Framework (DRF) and Djoser for restaurant management, including an ordering system, shopping cart, and user roles. The API allows different user types (Customers, Managers, Delivery Crew) to interact with the platform: customers can browse the menu, add items to a cart, place orders, and view their order history; managers can manage the menu, assign delivery staff, and update order statuses; and the delivery crew can view and update their assigned deliveries.

title: React Calculator
description: A simple and intuitive calculator application built with React that enables basic mathematical operations with a modern and responsive user interface. The application maintains a cumulative total and allows successive arithmetic operations, ideal for quick and simple calculations.

title: Oraculum
description: Oraculum is an AI-powered chatbot designed to answer questions with a mystical tone, inspired by fantasy worlds such as Dungeons & Dragons. It blends modern technology with the feeling of consulting an omniscient oracle, creating a unique experience that combines knowledge, magic, and usability. Oraculum is an AI chat application built with React, Vite, and an Express backend API, with deployment support on Netlify. The live site is available at oraculum-the-wise.netlify.app.

title: Urban Soles
description: UX/UI design project for a footwear e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, save shipping addresses, manage payment methods, and track their orders, with a strong focus on a clear and smooth shopping experience. UrbanSoles is a modern e-commerce application specialized in urban footwear, built with React, TypeScript, and Vite. The deployed site is available at urban-soles.netlify.app. The platform provides a complete online shopping experience, including user management, shopping cart functionality, order processing, and a full user profile system with addresses and payment methods.
